title: I accept no damage+healing source/dps+hps/absorb/cc counters, & no sandbox...
body:
But could we at least have an option in post match advanced details that shows all enemy death recaps?

It would basically be a Kill Recap only available by viewing advanced details online of a completed match.

Skipping why, so why not?  Seriously I wana know? only reason i've come to hear is Rito wants ppl to learn from playing.

But heres the problem with that, you can only make rough estimates and vague comparisons of techniques/strategies from the live action game-play experience.

I can't do the math If I don't have the numbers, I'm only left with theory's.

Either way, Rito is dictating hard...

replies.body: When I stop getting killed by revive then we can start learning from death recaps
For that to work, they'd need to fix death recaps so that they work.
